body_html: @RafaelCosman: I think the conclusion is that we don't want to support the independence you want to rely on, but we also don't want to guarantee that the exception will be thrown. Thus, what you want to do might happen to start working at some point in the future.
body_text: @RafaelCosman: I think the conclusion is that we don't want to support the independence you want to rely on, but we also don't want to guarantee that the exception will be thrown.  Thus, what you want to do might happen to start working at some point in the future.
body: @RafaelCosman: I think the conclusion is that we don't want to support the independence you want to rely on, but we also don't want to guarantee that the exception will be thrown.  Thus, what you want to do might happen to start working at some point in the future.
